title: RGSSH Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for 14 Senior Resident Posts
description: The Rajiv Gandhi Super Speciality Hospital (RGSSH) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 14 Senior Resident Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ MBBS, MD/MS, DNB, Post-graduation, or Diploma can apply for the RGSSH Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview.
